isPrivate.description: Flag to denote if the contact is private

date.description: Gets or sets the date of the event.

details.description: Gets or sets the details of the event.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the event.

state.description: Gets or sets the state of the user.

actions.description: Actions to follow for the worker

beginMonitoringUTC.description: The time that the system started monitoring the worker in UTC

endMonitoringUTC.description: The time that the system stopped monitoring the worker in UTC

isAcknowledged.description: A flag indicating whether the emergency for the worker has been acknowledged

lastReportUTC.description: The time the worker last reported OK in UTC

nextReportUTC.description: The time when the worker's next report is due in UTC

stateChangedUTC.description: The time of the worker's last state change in UTC
